text: Hagi tagranena zamagrama hazaza huta Juda vahe mani'none. Tagri mofavre naga'mo'za zamagri ne'mofavre naga'mo'zama nehazaza hu'za knare hu'naze. Hianagi mofavre nagatia zamatresanunke'za kazokazo eri'za ome erigahaze. Hagi mago'a mofa'netimo'za hago vu'za kazokazo eri'zana ome enerize. Hianagi tagrira hankavetia omane'ne, na'ankure mopatine waini hozatinena hago rumo'za eri'naze.
